Classification: Reality
Genre: Action | Family | Lifestyle | Talent
Status: Returning Series
Network: Discovery Channel ( USA)
Airs: Wednesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: January 26, 2011
Episode Order: 17

Louisiana gunsmiths and historians rise to the challenge daily on Discovery Channel's world premiere series "Sons of Guns", creating one-of-a-kind custom weapons.
